cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques for automated text categorization, which is a problem commonly studied in the information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-fields of computer science. The paper also discusses issues related to classifier construction and evaluation, which are topics that fall within the machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI) and deep learning (cs.DL) sub-fields. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.IR and cs.CL, followed by cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.DL.
